func tileGroup(

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/tileGroup(atColumn:row:)#parameters)

`column`The column index of the tile.

`row`The row index of the tile.

## [Return Value](/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileMapNode/tileGroup(atColumn:row:)#return-value)

The tile group for the tile at the specified column and row.
